summary: Frontend testing of Dealer Analytics Dashboard and Import/Export functionality - All features working correctly
passed_tests: ✅ Dealer Analytics Dashboard loads with stat cards (Total Transactions, Pending, Completed, Rejected, Revenue)
✅ Stat cards have proper color coding matching professional government-style layout
✅ Transactions bar chart displays with Week/Month/Year toggle buttons
✅ Week/Month/Year toggles are clickable and active state highlighted
✅ Sales area chart displays with category filters (All, Firearms, Ammunition, Accessories)
✅ Popular Categories donut chart shows inventory breakdown
✅ Av. Transaction horizontal bar chart displays with category values
✅ Av. Processing Time horizontal bar chart with status colors (Fast/Normal/Slow)
✅ Recent Activity section shows transaction history or 'No recent activity' message
✅ View All button in Recent Activity links to transactions page
✅ Inventory page has Import button visible in desktop layout
✅ Inventory page has Export button visible in desktop layout
✅ CSV Export downloads file 'inventory_export.csv' with 'Exported X items' toast
✅ Import button triggers native file browser (accepts .csv, .txt)
✅ Import dialog opens after file selection showing preview table
✅ Import dialog shows items count badge, SKU, Name, Qty, Price columns
✅ Import dialog has Clear, Cancel, and Import X Items buttons
✅ Download Template button works - downloads 'inventory_template.csv' with success toast
✅ Import dialog shows supported columns documentation
critical_code_review_comments: Analytics data (transactionsByMonth, salesByMonth) is MOCKED/generated client-side for demo purposes as noted in requirements

Import button in desktop layout directly opens file browser rather than showing an initial dialog - user must select file first to see Download Template option (workaround: Clear after file selection)
Consider adding data-testid attributes to Import/Export buttons for easier automated testing

demo_dealer.login_method: Click Dealer Portal -> Click Dealer demo button

seed_data_creation: Existing inventory item 'Glock 19 Gen5' (SKU: GLK19-G5-001) present from previous testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dealer Analytics Dashboard with Recharts is fully functional. All charts render correctly including bar charts, area charts, donut charts, and horizontal bar charts. Import/Export CSV functionality works - Export directly downloads file, Import requires file selection first before showing preview dialog with Download Template option. Analytics data is MOCKED for demo (transactionsByMonth, salesByMonth generated client-side).

dealer_analytics_dashboard.transactions_bar_chart: ✅ Working - stacked bars with Week/Month/Year toggle
dealer_analytics_dashboard.sales_area_chart: ✅ Working - line chart with gradient fill and category filters
dealer_analytics_dashboard.recent_activity: ✅ Working - shows transactions or empty state

inventory_import_export.import_dialog: ✅ Working - shows preview after file selection

mocked_data_note: Analytics charts use MOCKED data generated on frontend for demo. transactionsByMonth and salesByMonth are randomly generated based on actual transaction counts.
